mapper.select: SELECT p.productOffId,p.machineId,p.offtime,p.quantity,p.beginThermalTime,p.sendtime,p.taketime,p.sourceid,p.status,p.messageStatus,m.machineName,m.putMachineName FROM productoff AS p LEFT JOIN machine AS m ON p.MachineId=m.MachineId WHERE p.offtime>DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND (NOW() BETWEEN DATE_SUB(p.sendtime,INTERVAL -5 MINUTE) AND DATE_SUB(p.sendtime,INTERVAL -30 MINUTE)) AND p.Status=3 AND p.messageStatus=0

SELECT productoffid, productglobalid, machineid, offtime, beginthermaltime, sendtime, taketime, outid, lotno, quantity, actualprice, price, sourceid, status, messagestatus FROM productoff WHERE sourceid=#{sourceId}
mapper.update: UPDATE productoff SET messageStatus=1 WHERE sourceid=#{userOrderId}
